amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on the need for international support for the interim government of Haiti.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3686 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3686 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S9588-9592; text: CR S9588-9589) To express the sense of the Senate on the need for international support for the interim government of Haiti.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3686 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3686 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Leahy.
